title: Describe your main(s) as a tsundere/yandere

replies.body: {{champion:254}} It's not like I'm keeping the streets safe for you, Idiot.
That's totally something Vi would say.

> [{quoted}](name=Malicious Metal,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Ex0PhtA4,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-08-27T15:23:20.492+0000)
>
> That's totally something Vi would say.

Vi tsundere comfirmed.
Just ask Cupcake, she can confirm it :^)

http://pre03.deviantart.net/fec1/th/pre/f/2013/086/f/9/league_of_legends___ahri_mirai_nikki_style__d_by_xxalisa-d5zgobh.png

"Playtime is far from over"
STOP I CANT LOOK AT THOSE EYES ANYMORE

https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/564x/41/4e/a3/414ea35f9a39e8a711df37a6310a7910.jpg

Why does it kinda look like future diary... wait is that what its supposed to look like?
That's kind of the point, that's the basis of the "Yandere face"

{{champion:82}} 
"It's not like I mind you clicking more than once, F..Fool!"

He'll be the one to kill you and raise you from the dead would you ever turn him down.
Like that you'll be together for all eternity.
Though you'd be his eternal ghost slave, but hey, whatever floats your boat, right?

[http://i1166.photobucket.com/albums/q619/Wgni/baka_zpsxvshy2wv.png](http://i1166.photobucket.com/albums/q619/Wgni/baka_zpsxvshy2wv.png)
FINALLY I have a reason to post this!
makes me want less and less to be with u rp wise.

{{champion:14}} : "YOU CAN'T HIDE FROM MY LOVE BEHIND MINIONS!!!"

"IF ANYONE TRIES TO TAKE YOU FROM ME - NO ONE WILL EVER FIND THEIR BODY!!!"

"IF YOU TRY TO LEAVE ME - I WILL LEAVE NO BONE UNBROKEN!!!"

http://orig10.deviantart.net/87cf/f/2015/315/b/0/lol__soraka__yandere__by_lynashi-d9gbylv.gif

I will protect you!
{{champion:44}} https://d2arxad8u2l0g7.cloudfront.net/hostedimages/1398377123ra/9407844.gif

http://www.deviantart.com/art/Cosy-Vel-Koz-438760345

Here, taste this tea I made you, for science of course.

i'll let Sona for senpai, he knows much more than me i think.

yandere {{champion:202}} would find the most beautiful girl ever, he would never leave and can't kill her else her body would disappear from decaying. If someone ever dare to glare at her, then whisper would immediatly get to work.

tsundere {{champion:202}}  is beyond my imagination.

OMG
YES
THIS
INEED
OMG
http://img01.deviantart.net/345e/i/2013/285/2/e/yandere_sona_by_gules1-d6q7a1g.png

http://img02.deviantart.net/92f7/i/2014/365/f/0/diana___yandere_style_by_claynigel-d8bfxr2.jpg

"I want to slice you"

{{champion:267}} 

"I decide what the tide will bring." **pulls you in without asking**

"Wash them away, now!!" **grabs your arm with a death stare**

"It wasn't like you're the catch, b-baka..." **Blushes**

{{champion:89}} 

"Don't stare directly at me for too long.... idiot." **Embarrassed**

"Rally to me, and ONLY to me." **Pulling your collar**

http://i1042.photobucket.com/albums/b430/bluemoonwolf8/creepyWukong_zpskatmknxd.png
I won't let the enemy get near sempai... I won't let ANYONE get near sempai O_O
https://i.gyazo.com/bc6cb3b7cc2186956c6a891ef089d39d.png

{{champion:92}}  "Did that girl just look at you?" *Whispers and eyes narrow* "She cannot go unpunished..!"

"What? I reforged my sword to defeat my enemies! I absolutely did not do it for you..!"

{{champion:21}} 
How do you like my guns, Shock and Awe? I meant my weapons! Well, I guess you could consider those weapons too in certain context...
{{champion:37}} :
{{champion:61}}: I'm only shielding you so I can hit them with my ult.  I couldn't care less what happens to you, b-baka.
{{champion:114}} is told to not be looking for love in her lore, tsundere material right there
{{champion:26}} : I only ulted you to stack my {{item:3070}}, It's not like I want to keep you alive b-baka.
{{champion:114}}  I only care for vitals... Vital SENPAI!

{{champion:61}} We will kill your enemies. That will be fun. 

Wait...
I'm just here to watch people inject meaning into their lives with memes.

{{champion:79}} 
"Drink it or don't, baka. I don't care..."
{{champion:14}} Its not like you already killed me, baka
{{champion:19}} "This will be fun" ;)

{{champion:68}} 
"Yeah.... I-I'm going... b-baka..."

{{champion:99}} 

"Who's this Ahri and why have you been hanging out with Taliyah?"

"I got a new Sailor Moon skin just for you, Summoner-san"

"Well, I do wonder if my Final Spark works through monitors"
